name: Shadepaint
description:
There is a saying in the game dev community that goes: "Limitation brings creativity".
So, I made this painting program, that gives you a 512x512 canvas, and a shade of a color. I want to see, what pieces of art you can do with these limitations.

If you encounter any bugs in the program please contact me. My profile should provide contact methods.

Thanks to Bemxio for code support.

Enjoy!
